data.name: 进入后室 Get into Backrooms
data.detailed_description:
This is a small leisure game with the theme of the back room. The player will play an ordinary person, enter the back room in a strange way, face the pursuit of various entities, constantly escape, find the exit and the truth, defeat the company's plot, or destroy the lizard people to save the whole human race, or return to the real world.
The operation of the game is very simple. You just need to run away all the time. "Don't stop! As long as you don't stop, the road will continue to extend."
Enter the back room, avoid the entity, find the exit, and find the truth. This is the whole content of this game, very simple.

This is a great game =)
This is a junk game=(

This game is boring =(

Buy this game quickly =)
Don't waste your money=(

This game will bring you a good time =)
Don't waste your time=(

There are cakes, milk tea and party balloons =)
There's nothing here. Don't believe it=(
